data.title: Footprints on Sand: a Literary Sampler by De Camp, L Sprague; De Camp, Catherine Crook
data.meta_description: Footprints on Sand: A Literary Sampler by De Camp, Catherine Crook,De Camp, L. Sprague and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition. Illustrated by C.H. Burnett. Near Fine in Fine jacket, unclipped (no price). Purple cloth with gilt lettering on the spine and front board. Firmly bound with a forward lean, clean internally. This copy comes from the collection of Advent co-founder Jon Stopa.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. 1st Edition. Advent Publishers Inc., 1981. Hardcover. CONDITION: Fine, UNREAD 1st edition. DJ CONDITION: Near Fine. Maroon cloth boards in like new condition, no surface wear, sharp corners, gilt text and design bright. Binding tight, spine straight, no shelf wear except light cloth roll at spine top. Text block very tight, 327 pristine pages; bright, clean and unmarked, no bent or creased corners. DJ in VG-NF condition; no surface or corner wear, light roll to spine top, price sticker on back panel.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. Signed, with inscription, by both authors, else text clean & bright; binding tight; minor wear to dustjacket. 327 pages. Color photography frontispiece portrait of both authors. One of 1500 unnumbered copies. 5 1/2" x 8 1/2".

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. C. H. Burnett (illustrator). First Trade Edition. First trade edition. Inscribed on the half-title page "To Stuart Wells - hoping you'll enjoy these samples of our work-- by both authors and dated Dec. 5, 1981, dustjacked is slightly sun-lightened on the spine, never read. Price sticker of $12.00 on inside flap. Letter "L" on the title page written by the author before he changed his mind and decided to inscribe the book on the half-title. Signed by Author(s).

Octavo, cloth. First edition. One of 500 numbered copies signed by the de Camps. Distributed at X-con 5. Miscellany collecting short stories, poetry, and nonfiction. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. (#157356).

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition. 1981. Hardback. Fine. First Edition. First Print. An excellent addition to your collection. Dust jacket is protected with a Mylar cover. Books are packed and shipped in boxes. Hardback.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition. SIGNED by l. Sprague & Catherine Crook De Camp on the Title page. Signature only. A First edition, First printing. Book is in Fine condition. Boards are clean, not bumped. Fore edges are clean. Interior is clean and legible. Not remaindered. Dust Jacket is in Fine condition. Not chipped or crinkled. Not price clipped. Dust Jacket is covered by Mylar Brodart. Thanks and Enjoy. All-ways well boxed, All-ways fast service. Thanks. Signed by Author(s). Book.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. Burnett, C. H. (illustrator). 1st Edition. Flat signed on the title page by both authors and the illustrator. Jacket has very minor edgewear along top edge. Signed by Author(s).

HARD BACK BROWN. Condition: POOR. JACKET: WORN DJ. C.H. BURNETT (illustrator). FIRST ED. burgundy cloth hardback, book is shaken, staining to front and back cover; dustjacket has some chipping to top and bottom, dj has some fading and is soiled. Footprints On Sand A Literary Sampler by: Sprague L. De Camp and Catherine Crook De Camp. Illustrated by C.H. Burnett. Publisher: Advent Inc. New York. Full Signature of each Author: With Gratitude for a very happy visit to Highand Park Love, Catherine Crook De CAmp. Dated June 12, 1982. 1st Edition June 1981. 1 of 1500 copies. DATE PUBLISHED: 1981 EDITION: FIRST ED 327.
